indications: Indications maintenance in schizophrenia and other psychoses
name: PIPOTIAZINE PALMITATE
breadcrumbs: 4.2 Drugs used in psychoses and related disorders
cautions: Cautions see section 4.2.1 and notes above; also thyrotoxicosis; hypothyroidism
side-effects: Side-effects see section 4.2.1 and notes above
doses:
By deep intramuscular injection into the
gluteal muscle, test dose 25 mg, then a further 25–50 mg after 4–7
days, then adjusted according to response at intervals of 4 weeks;
usual maintenance range 50–100 mg (max. 200 mg) every 4 weeks; elderly initially 5–10 mg; child not recommended
